company.name: Razorpay
company.description: Razorpay is India's leading payment gateway that enables businesses to accept, process, and disburse payments with ease. We provide a full-stack financial solution including payment gateway, payment links, subscriptions, smart routing, and business banking.

features: UPI, Cards, Wallets, Net Banking support
Smart Routing for higher success rates
Route mobile SDKs for Android and iOS

pricing.description: We charge a simple transaction fee of 2% per successful payment. No setup fees, no annual maintenance charges. You only pay when you earn. For high volume businesses, we offer custom pricing. International payments are charged at 3%.

common_faqs.question: Is there a free trial?
common_faqs.answer: Yes! You can sign up for free and test our payment gateway in sandbox mode with no charges. When you go live, you only pay per successful transaction.

common_faqs.question: How long does integration take?
common_faqs.answer: Integration is very simple. Most developers complete basic integration in under 2 hours using our detailed documentation and SDKs. We support REST APIs, mobile SDKs, and no-code solutions like payment links.

common_faqs.question: What kind of support do you provide?
common_faqs.answer: We offer 24/7 customer support via email, phone, and chat. You also get a dedicated account manager for enterprise plans. Our documentation is comprehensive with code samples in multiple languages.

common_faqs.question: Do you support international payments?
common_faqs.answer: Yes, we support international card payments in over 100 currencies. We're licensed and compliant with global payment standards including PCI DSS Level 1 certification.

common_faqs.question: How fast are settlements?
common_faqs.answer: With Razorpay Instant Settlements, you can get funds in your bank account within seconds for a small additional fee. Standard settlements happen in T+2 days at no extra cost.
